author_ssm: Ben Gocker, Librarian; Olivia Morales Geaghan, Archivist; Revised and updated by Diana Bowers-Smith, Archivist
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of 89 Brooklyn-based newspapers on microfilm. These newspapers contain local news in specific neighborhoods as well as borough, city, and national news.

unitdate_ssm: Inclusive, November 1952 and 1954; very few issues 1953, 1955, 1957, 1959
